suggestions.original: To improve the line combination in the artwork, consider refining the background lines to create a more cohesive and harmonious backdrop. The current abstract lines can be integrated more smoothly with the subject by using consistent line weights and directions. Additionally, adding subtle line details to the background can enhance depth and provide a more balanced composition. This will help in highlighting the subject while maintaining overall harmony in the piece.
